hero_subtext: Crafting modern, responsive web solutions with ReactJS, Next.js, and more üöÄ
about_description_1: I'm determined to embark on an exciting journey into the world of web development and be part of a productive team.
about_additional_paragraph_1: After learning web development on my own and getting more skills at DIGITALE CAMPUS PARIS, I'm ready for a real job in this exciting area...
about_additional_paragraph_2: I like working with others and am ready to use what I know in a place that's making cool stuff happen...
section_subtext_experiences: What I have done so far
experiences_01_point1: Web development (Javascript, Next.js, PHP, Symfony, SASS).
experiences_01_point2: Development of a Next.js web application communicating with an API created in Symfony.
projects_description: Following projects showcase my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.
beer_repository_description: A React-based exploration of beers styled with Styled-components, tapping into the 'https://punkapi.com/' API, outfitted with custom-built pagination, tailored hooks, and smart cache management for a high-performance web experience.
cms_portfolio_description: React-powered Portfolio integrated with Sanity CMS. Explore my projects with ease, thanks to a seamless content management system that keeps the portfolio up to date effortlessly.
my_portfolio_description: My impressive portfolio created with React and Tailwind. Discover seamless navigation, stunning visuals, and innovative 3D creations powered by React Three Fiber.
the_advisor_description: Powered by React, The Advisor utilizes a random advice API to deliver up to 5 insightful advices per day. Capture inspiration by saving your favorite advice to Notion.
weather_app_description: Vue.js weather app powered by a reliable weather API, providing real-time updates based on your location. Plus, track your battery level for seamless planning.
testimonials_01_feedback: I had the opportunity to work with Chiheb for a few months on a project (NextJS - Symfony). Chiheb is a curious profile, diligent, and who progresses quickly. He has completed a quality project having a role as a fullstack developer, which leads me to recommend his profile.
contact_textarea_message_placeholder: What do you want to say?
